summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Hair Lab Conditioner for Hair Loss Hair Regrowth and Thinning Hair. Organic Ingredients. DHT Blockers, Argan Oil, Pumpkin Seed Oil. Suitable for All Hair Types. Sulfate-Free. (8 ounce) Review Date: 2016/09/12 Store: Hair Lab Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 2.3 x 2.3 inches; 9.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '647971367291'} Review Text: well i have been using this product for two weeks now .i have noticed that my brush is not as full of hair as it has been .i am very pleased with this conditioner,it works well. it helps untangle my hair a lot better than products i have tried before .my hair is now silky and smooth .it no longer feels like a horses mane.i can now wear black with out hair falling out all over my shirt.i love this hair conditioner. it works great.i have received this product at a free or reduced price Review Title: i love it Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: FANTCEN Foot File Callus Remover Ergonomic Foot Rasp Callus Remover Stainless Steel Pedicure Cuticle Tool for Home DIY Red Review Date: 2016/09/28 Store: FANTCEN Product Description: ['Prime Foot File Callus Remover Red by FANTCEN', "What's in package:", '1 stainless steel foot rasp', 'Experience the Benefits of Foot File Today', 'SHARP EFFECTIVE CALLUS REMOVER: with the sharp and big hole, easily remove the thick callus, bad heel and tough deep skin on wet and dry feet. It is better than pumice stones, exfoliation scrubs, callus removal gels, great for heels, balls of feet.', 'CONVIENCE AND PORTABLE: The light weight design allows you to work with ease and gives quick amazing smoothness. Not like the electric foot file, it helps you save the charging time, great for home and travel use.', 'With ergonomic resin handle, you can hold foot rasps firmly. With durable Stainless steel, you can make a long use for your callus removing.', 'SAVE MONEY: With this deluxe foot file, you can remove callus by yourself and save money for going to nail salon, great choice for cost savings.', 'Gives equally good results on both dry and wet foot surfaces that allows the user to work according to their own preference and satisfaction', 'Note', 'Dry after use, please store it in a dry place for next use.'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'FANTCEN', 'Material': 'resin, Stainless Steel', 'Color': 'Redfootfile', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10.4 x 2.6 x 1.2 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'FANTCEN'} Review Text: When I recieved my Fantcen Foot File Callus Remover I did not expect too much. I have tried so many callus removers that have not worked. The one that did the handle broke .So I did not expect much when I ordered this .Well I was wrong, this callus remover works so well. That I can not think of any thing negative to say about it . It really works and the handle being curved the way it is makes it so much easier to use. I have had a problem doing my own feet, because of the bending of my foot and back always made me have muscle spasms . I did not have this problem with my Fantcen Foot File Callus Remover this file is the last one i will ever need.
I have received this product at a free or reduced price Review Title: PAMPER YOUR FEET Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Delux Premium Blackhead & Blemish Remover Kit - Acne Treatment - 6 Professional Surgical Extractor Instruments - Extra Lancet - Cure Pimples, Blackheads, Comedones, Facial Impurities-Macs-2010 Review Date: 2016/10/18 Store: Mac Professional Product Description: ["Macs Delux Blackhead & ; Blemish Remover Kit The #1 Dermatologist Approved Blackhead Remover Kit Stop Trying to Press or Pop them Yourself! You Won't Find a Better and Safer Solution for Perfect Skin Features:- - Ideal for Removal of all types of Blackheads, Cone domes and Facial Impurities - 6 Unique Remover Tools With in One kit that Dermatologists across the country use. - Easy to Use and Designed for Optimal Balance, Comfort and Performance for Your Skin! Will not cause irritation or redness. Everyone knows that when you try popping facial blemishes yourself it can be very painful and lead to ugly scars. That is the last thing anyone wants.Use The Tools in this Kit to Easily Clean Your Precious Skin. For Real Customer Service We believe our products are the absolute best we can offer to our customers. If for any reason at all, you are not fully satisfied with your essential Blackhead Kit, just simply return it for a full refund or exchange. Simple as that! Treat Your Skin the Way it Should Be with This Beauty Kit and Click ADD TO CART Above! **SPECIAL PROMOTIONAL OFFER** BUY NOW AND GET 60 DAYS REPLACEMENT WARRANTY !"] Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mac Professional', 'Item Form': 'Needle', 'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Number of Items': '7', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.8 x 2.7 x 1.3 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MACS-2010', 'Manufacturer': 'Macs Products'} Review Text: My granddaughter has taken my Delux Package of Blackhead and Blemish remover .She loves it .She says it has helped her a lot because shes not pinching them with her fingers, they are no longer making sores on her face .I would recommend this to any one with teenagers it works . I hope I have helped you make a decision on whether or not to buy this amazing pack blackhead removers.Please check yes or no at the bottom of this reveiw Review Title: YOU NEED THIS ASAP IF YOU HAVE TEENAGERS Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Transformation Beauty 365 - Skin Tightening Serum - Instantly Firms, Tightens And Lifts. Smooths Wrinkles And Fine Lines, Provides A Gentle Mini Face And Neck Lift To Sagging Or Tired Skin. (1 Pack) Review Date: 2016/10/24 Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Use for': 'Neck, Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 2.6 x 0.3 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '611138543804'} Review Text: This skin tightening serum is wonderful . It makes me look younger by tightening my skin. I can feel it working I love this serum .I will continue to use it .I recommend this wonderful serum to any one man or woman who wants to slow down the ageing to a crawl.
. Review Title: FIRM UP FAST Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Anti Aging Eye Wrinkle Cream for Women & Men with Hyaluronic Acid Matrixyl 3000 Complex to Moisturize Your Skin Day And Night – 1.8 Fl. Oz Review Date: 2016/11/10 Store: CARDEA LUXE Product Description: ["How annoying is it when you wake up in the morning or come home from a hard day's work and look in the mirror and all you can see are dark circles or puffy bags under your eyes? Have you tried other eye creams and still found yourself wondering why you look older than your age? Would you like a simple, effective and affordable way to eliminate fine lines, puffiness and under eye circles? Why look your age when you don't have to? Cardea LuxeTM is a luxurious, highly emollient-enriched organic, anti-oxidant and cellular rejuvenating eye cream therapy that's ideal for both men and women of all ages. You'll be very pleased with the fast-acting, long-lasting benefits to your fragile and vulnerable eye area. Our eye cream has a light consistency that instantly absorbs into the skin without leaving a heavy, sticky or greasy feeling, allowing you to immediately apply your makeup. Our advanced eye therapy has combined age-defying peptides, botanicals, pure plant oils, organic vitamins and minerals, skin boosting and rebuilding Matrixyl 3000 and an ocean-based Retinol, which is a key ingredient for radiant-looking eyes that belay your age. Gradual improvements noticeable after a short time Used twice daily, morning and evening for healing Great for men and women of all ages and skin tones Rehydrates the skin and regenerates new skin cells Protects, tightens and firms delicate eye areas Bonus: Cream can be used on face & neck areas as well Oil and gluten free with a refreshing cucumber scent No parabens, alcohol, sulfates or harsh chemicals Once you've experienced Cardea Luxe's Radiance Eye Cream you'll no longer have to worry about under eye bags, dark circles or wrinkles again - we guarantee it. CLICK the Add to Cart button now to order Radiance Eye Therapy and beautifully frame your gorgeous eyes."] Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'CARDEA LUXE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'Peptides, Vitamin_c, Hyaluronic_acid', 'Unit Count': '1.8 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.1 x 2.7 x 2.6 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Radiance3000', 'UPC': '691965999593', 'Manufacturer': 'Cardea Luxe'} Review Text: This is the best eye wrinkle skin care I have ever tried .I am impressed with this cream .Its made out of organic materials with no animal testing . That is very important to me . I wont use animal tested products . It is that important to me . This wonderful cream pulls out the fine lines around my eyes . I am noticing the difference now . I feel younger now that I look a few years younger .This cream is good for your eyes and the surrounding areas .I hope this review has helped you to make a decision on whether or not to buy this wonderful product. Review Title: TRY IT YOU WILL LOVE IT Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history reveals a clear preference for skin and hair care products with a focus on organic and effective ingredients. The individual consistently shows high sentiment towards products that improve personal grooming and aesthetics, evident in the high ratings for foot care and anti-aging solutions, suggesting a strong desire for self-care and maintenance. 

Common themes include hair regrowth, foot care, and anti-aging, indicating a proactive approach to personal appearance and wellness. The use of phrases like "works well" and "makes me look younger" illustrates satisfaction with efficacy, highlighting their emphasis on quality and performance.

Quality plays a significant role in their purchasing decisions, as they show a preference for products boasting organic materials and effectiveness in maintaining or enhancing appearance. Price sensitivity appears moderate; the individual seems willing to invest in products that demonstrate their value, emphasizing the cost savings associated with self-care (e.g., at-home treatments).

Overall, this individual prioritizes effective, high-quality, and organic personal care solutions, while demonstrating loyalty to products that deliver tangible results. Their purchasing behavior reflects an overarching desire for self-improvement and confidence enhancement in personal grooming.

target_interaction.title: LOOK YOUR BEST STAND OUT FROM THE REST
target_interaction.text: Once I taught myself how to use it ,it became my #one makeup staple. I would not trade this water proof eye liner for any thing . I love the professional look I  achieve each time I use it  .It is easy to use it just glides on .When I first tried it I put it on crooked but after a couple of tries I mastered the art .
